metadata.Description: Solar power generation using concentrated sunlight

level 1.Description: Concentrated solar power implements the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.
Concentrated solar power funds research and development activities to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of solar power technology.
Concentrated solar power focuses on supporting the clean energy transition by providing a sustainable and renewable energy source.
Concentrated solar power is included in the renewable energy portfolio to diversify the energy mix and reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
Concentrated solar power partners with electricity grid operators to ensure the integration and efficient distribution of solar power into the grid.
Concentrated solar power contributes to climate change mitigation by reducing greenhouse gas emissions and promoting sustainable energy practices.
Concentrated solar power monitors the performance and operation of solar power plants to ensure optimal efficiency and maintenance.
Concentrated solar power targets the increase of renewable energy capacity by expanding the deployment of solar power plants.
